long_description: The MSR SweetWater(R) SiltStopper(TM) prefilter attaches to the end of a SweetWater water filter (sold separately) inlet hose to remove larger particles. Removes 25 micron particles before they reach the main filter. SiltStopper is more porous than a SweetWater filter and may clog sooner-prefilter replacements sold separately. Attach the MSR SweetWater SiltStopper such that the red side filters the incoming water.
short_description: The MSR SweetWater(R) SiltStopper(TM) prefilter attaches to the end of a SweetWater water filter (sold separately) inlet hose to remove larger particles.
